data: Manuel es un joven estudiante cuya vida cambia completamente cuando su madre Elena sufre un ictus. Durante el periodo de recuperación, Elena conoce a Carmelo, quien cambia como ella ve su propio destino. (Manuel is a young student whose life completely changes when his mother Elena, has a stroke. He stops going out with friends, abandons his studies and starts working to pay for the care center where she's admitted. After a relapse, Elena travels with her son to San Felices, the village where she first worked as a teacher, where she fell in love for the first time, where Manuel was born, where she was happy... and where she has never returned to until now. It is there that they rekindle the profound love that they feel for each other, but the moment to answer the questions her son has asked her all these years also comes.)

Manuel es un joven estudiante cuya vida cambia completamente cuando su madre Elena sufre un ictus. Durante el periodo de recuperación, Elena conoce a Carmelo, quien cambia como ella ve su propio destino.

Manuel is a young student whose life completely changes when his mother Elena, has a stroke. He stops going out with friends, abandons his studies and starts working to pay for the care center where she's admitted. After a relapse, Elena travels with her son to San Felices, the village where she first worked as a teacher, where she fell in love for the first time, where Manuel was born, where she was happy... and where she has never returned to until now. It is there that they rekindle the profound love that they feel for each other, but the moment to answer the questions her son has asked her all these years also comes.
